phrases.changes-may-not-be-saved: Changes you made may not be saved
phrases.you-are-offline: You are currently in offline mode

errors.bad-connection: Your network connection may be unstable. Please try again later or connect to another network.
errors.browser-feature-not-supported: Your browser does not support this feature.
errors.chat-connection-restoring: Chat connection is unstable or offline. Attempting to restore...
errors.chat-connection-unhealthy: Chat connection is unstable or offline. Please try again later or restart the app.
errors.chat-list-render-error: Encountered an error rendering your chats
errors.chat-message-render-error: Encountered an error rendering this message
errors.chat-payment-failed: Could not update that chat payment
errors.chat-unavailable: This federation does not have a chat server.
errors.failed-to-load-tos: Failed to load terms of service
errors.get-nostr-pubkey-failed: Failed to get nostr pub key
errors.insufficient-balance: Insufficient balance. You only have {{balance}} in your wallet
errors.invalid-character: The following characters are not allowed: " & ' / : < >
errors.invalid-group-code: This is not a valid group code
errors.no-lightning-gateways: No lightning gateways found for this user
errors.onchain-deposits-disabled: Onchain deposits have been disabled for this federation
errors.only-group-owners-can-change-name: Only group owners can change the group name
errors.please-force-quit-the-app: An error occurred, please force quit the app and try again
errors.receives-have-been-disabled: Receives have been disabled for this federation
errors.history-render-error: Encountered an error rendering this item
errors.username-already-exists: This username already exists. Recover your wallet to restore your username.
errors.you-have-already-joined: You have already joined this federation

backup.backed-up-recovery-words: You backed up your wallet with 12 recovery words
backup.camera-access-information: To create a social backup, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to record a verification video
backup.choose-method-instructions: Backing up your wallet will help you recover your money if you ever lose access to Fedi
backup.cloud-backup-instructions: Create a backup of your recovery file in your cloud storage. You will also be required to backup this file with two friends or family.
backup.hold-record-button: Hold the record button and say:
backup.press-record-button: Press the record button and say:
backup.personal-backup-guidance-check-1: You will write down 12 words which can be used to recover your Federation wallet
backup.personal-backup-guidance-check-2: Fedi or the Federation does not keep a copy of these recovery words
backup.personal-backup-instructions: Write down 12 recovery words. This is for experienced members.
backup.record-error: Encountered an error using your camera
backup.recovery-words-instructions: Write these words down with pen and paper. Do not save these words digitally on your phone.
backup.review-face-confirmation: I confirm my face can be clearly seen in this video
backup.review-voice-confirmation: I confirm my voice can be clearly heard in this video
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-where: We recommend saving your file in different places (messaging apps, email, cloud storage, etc.)
backup.social-backup-guidance-check-1: You will record a backup video which will be used to create a recovery file which can be used to recover your Federation wallet
backup.social-backup-guidance-check-2: You will backup this recovery file in your cloud storage as well as with two friends or family members
backup.social-backup-guidance-check-3: If you need to recover your wallet, your Federation Guardians can use this recovery file to recover your wallet.
backup.social-backup-guidance-check-4: Federation Guardians will not have access to this recovery file unless you initiate a social recovery and share it with them
backup.social-backup-instructions: Record a video to prove your identity. This option is best if you know your guardians well.
backup.social-backup-processing-info-1: This recovery file contains your backup video and details about your Federation.
backup.social-backup-processing-info-2: This file alone cannot be used to recover your money, as guardians will check your identity at that time of recovery
backup.start-personal-backup-instructions: Get a pen and paper and write down the recovery words on the next screen.
backup.start-social-backup-instructions: Social backups allow you to safely backup your wallet with friends and family and have Federation guardians assist you recover it if you lose access
backup.successfully-backed-up: You successfully backed up your Fedi wallet
backup.video-file-too-large: Video file too large, please record a shorter one

bug.description-placeholder: What did you expect and what happened instead?
bug.info-label: Send Federation and Username with bug report
bug.log-disclaimer: Application logs will be included with your report to help Fedi developers diagnose the issue
bug.success-title: Thank you for your bug report!

chat.admin-settings-instructions: These members can send messages in the broadcast only groups
chat.broadcast-admin-instructions: These members can send messages in the broadcast group
chat.broadcast-only-notice: You cannot send messages in a broadcast-only room
chat.camera-access-information: To join a group, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to scan a group invite link
chat.changing-broadcast-not-supported: Changing the broadcast setting is not yet supported. Please create a new group.
chat.confirm-add-admin-to-group: Are you sure you want to add {{username}} as an admin? They will be able to send messages in this group.
chat.confirm-remove-admin-from-group: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}} as an admin? They won't be able to send messages in this group but their previously sent messages will remain.
chat.create-or-join-a-new-group: Create or join a new group
chat.fedi-community-message-preview: Welcome to Fedi! This channel will keep you up to date on events happening within your Fedi app
chat.invalid-group: This is not a valid chat group
chat.invalid-member: This is not a valid chat member
chat.leave-group-confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the group? All group message history will be lost.
chat.member-not-found: Could not find a member with the username '{{username}}'
chat.need-registration-description: Register a username to be able to send and receive with other members.
chat.no-one-is-in-this-group: No one is in this group yet.
chat.scan-member-code-notice: Show QR to share your username
chat.select-or-start: Select a chat, or start a new chat
chat.type-to-search-members: Type to search members in this group

developer.developer-mode-deactivated: You are no longer a developer...

federations.camera-access-information: To join a Federation, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to scan the Federation invite code
federations.leave-federation-confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave this federation?
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-first: You must withdraw your funds before leaving
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-pending-stable: Your {{currency}} withdrawal is still processing. Please try again in 10 minutes.
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-stable-first: You must withdraw your entire {{currency}} balance before leaving.

fees.guidance-ecash: Smart! Sending money to friends in your federation is cheaper and easier‚Äîand cooler too. üòé
fees.guidance-lightning: ü§ë Want to save money on fees? Send in Chat instead!
fees.guidance-stable-balance: *This is the max you could pay to hold this balance for a year. It may be less! üòâ
fees.guidance-onchain: Sending on-chain bitcoin is subject to network fees. Honestly, it's better for beefy amounts.

fedimods.add-mods-homescreen: Add Mods to your Fedi home screen
fedimods.debug-mode-info: Injects a dev tool (Eruda) into the browser when opening Fedi Mods
fedimods.enter-amount-to-withdraw: Enter an amount to withdraw from {{fediMod}}
fedimods.stable-balance-enabled-info: Enables ability to convert sats to stable currency

omni.camera-permission-denied: Go to settings to change Camera permissions.
omni.confirm-ecash-token: This is an eCash token, do you want to redeem it?
omni.confirm-federation-invite: This is a federation invitation, do you want to join?
omni.confirm-fedi-chat: This is a chat link, do you want to go there?
omni.confirm-lightning-pay: This is a lightning payment request, do you want to pay it?
omni.confirm-lightning-withdraw: This is a lightning withdrawal, do you want to withdraw?
omni.confirm-lnurl-auth: Do you want to log in to {{domain}} with lightning?
omni.confirm-onchain-pay: This is a bitcoin onchain payment, do you want to pay it?
omni.confirm-website-url: This is a website url, do you want to open this in your browser?
omni.search-placeholder-username-or-ln: Enter a username or lightning address
omni.unsupported-bolt12: BOLT 12 offers aren‚Äôt supported yet. Sorry!
omni.unsupported-legacy-chat: This chat QR is from a version of the app that is no longer supported. Sorry!
omni.unsupported-no-federation: You can‚Äôt use that before joining a federation. Try scanning a federation invite instead.
omni.unsupported-on-chain: On-chain bitcoin addresses aren‚Äôt supported yet. Sorry!
omni.unsupported-unknown: Hmm, that's not a format we recognize. Sorry!

onboarding.by-clicking-i-accept: By clicking 'I accept' you agree to the terms of service at {{tos_url}}
onboarding.by-clicking-you-agree-user-agreement: By clicking 'Join a Federation' you agree to the <anchor>User Agreement</anchor>
onboarding.chat-earn-save-spend: Chat, earn, save, and spend money privately with your community
onboarding.greeting-instructions: Now you will be able to send money, communicate with your community, and more with Fedi.
onboarding.guidance-1: Chat, earn, save, and spend money privately with your community
onboarding.guidance-2: Fedi uses your community to make it easy to backup and secure your money, change to local money or get help.
onboarding.guidance-3: With Fedi you have private balances, payments and communication by default, without the effort.
onboarding.guidance-4: Fedi uses bitcoin and lightning network to connect you to global opportunities to earn money online on your own terms.
onboarding.guidance-public-federations: Try a community from the Awesome Fedimint list
onboarding.new-users-disabled-notice: Sorry, this federation is not accepting new users
onboarding.unsupported-notice: This federation is no longer supported. It cannot be joined.
onboarding.username-guidance: Enter a username containing lowercase letters without spaces
onboarding.username-instructions: Your username will be how other members will identify you.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-new: As a new member of the federation, you will receive a fresh wallet.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-returning: As a returning member of the federation, your wallet will be restored. This may take a few minutes.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-unknown: New members receive a fresh wallet. Returning members will have their old wallet recovered automatically.

parser.unsupported-bolt11-zero-amount: Zero amount Lightning invoices are not supported. Generate a new invoice with an amount and try again.

permissions.allow-camera-description: Scan QR codes, chat usernames, send money, and more
permissions.allow-notifications-description: New chat messages, payments, and announcements

popup.ending-description: This temporary federation <bold>will end {{date}}</bold>. The remaining funds will be managed at the discretion of the guardians.

receive.balance-not-spendable-offline: This balance will not be able to be spent until you come back online
receive.camera-access-information: To receive money offline, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to scan an offline payment code
receive.instructions: Enter how much you want to receive
receive.onchain-notice: On-chain deposits take ~10 hours to confirm. Use Lightning for instant transactions

recovery.camera-access-information: To assist with recovery, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to scan the social recovery code
recovery.cancel-social-recovery-detail: Would you like to cancel social recovery?
recovery.choose-method-instructions: Choose the method you used to back up your wallet when you first joined {{federation}}
recovery.guardian-approval-instructions: Guardians need to confirm you are the person in your Fedi Intro Video to recover your money
recovery.guardian-approval-step-1: 1. Arrange meetings with Guardians (see Guardians below)
recovery.guardian-approval-step-2: 2. Ask the Guardian to scan your QR code
recovery.guardian-approval-step-3: 3. They will view your video and check your identity
recovery.guardian-approval-step-4: 4. If they confirm, your money will be recovered to your wallet
recovery.guardian-qr-instructions: Guardians will need to scan this QR code to begin the social recovery process
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-1: You may have shared this file with friends or stored it in a few different places:
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-3: The Fedi File name looks like:
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed-instructions: Backup file {{fileName}} failed to open. Please try and recover from another one of your shared locations.
recovery.personal-recovery-instructions: Enter the 12 words you wrote down when you first backed up your wallet
recovery.personal-recovery-method: If you wrote down 12 recovery words you can enter them again to recover your wallet
recovery.recover-wallet-with-balance: Recovery is currently unsupported for wallets with a balance. Please withdraw your funds first.
recovery.recovering-your-wallet: Recovering your wallet, please check back later
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-1: The member with you is comfortable, calm and not agitated
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-2: The immediate surroundings of the individual are safe
recovery.recovery-assist-description: A member of your Federation is requesting your assistance in recovering their wallet
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-1: 1. Check the member is calm and safe
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-4: 4. Confirm they are the same person in the backup video
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-5: 5. Approve or deny the members recovery request
recovery.recovery-assist-thank-you: Thank you for helping recover money for a Federation member
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-1: Watch video to confirm member identity.
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-2: Does this video show the same member trying to do social recovery now?
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-no: No, the person in the video is not the same person as the member
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-yes: Yes, the person in the video is the same person as the member
recovery.recovery-in-progress-balance: Recovery is in progress. Your balances will be available soon.
recovery.recovery-in-progress-chat-payments: Recovery is in progress. Chat payments will be available soon.
recovery.recovery-in-progress-payments: Recovery is in progress. Payments will be available soon.
recovery.social-recovery-instructions: Open your social recovery Fedi file that was created when you recorded your backup video. We prompted you to save the file and share it with friends.
recovery.social-recovery-method: If you recorded a video, meet with the guardians to have them confirm your identity
recovery.social-recovery-unsuccessful-instruction: Try to go back to the guardians and prove your identity

send.camera-access-information: To send money, you will need to allow Fedi access to your camera to scan a payment request
send.offline-send-warning: On the next step, when the QR is presented, the sats will be removed from your wallet

stabilitypool.deposits-disabled-by-federation: Stability Pool Deposits have been disabled by the Federation
stabilitypool.pending-withdrawal-blocking: Please wait for pending withdrawals to process before making further deposits or withdrawals
stabilitypool.stable-balance-beta: This is a beta feature. Please enjoy responsibly with small amounts and report any bugs in Settings.
stabilitypool.no-bitcoin-notice: You must have bitcoin to deposit into {{currency}} balance

wallet.show-fiat-txn-amounts-info: Transaction amounts will be displayed in the selected fiat currency
